Name: Mining Drone
Description:
Nano-Enabled Construction Robot

Can attack ground units

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Sacrifices the Mining Drone to repair a targeted mechanical unit for 500 life over 8 seconds
Root.Name: Nanite Repair

Root.Tooltip: Orders Mining Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Fluorite Deposit.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Mining Drone replaces a harvester arm with a grenade launcher
Root.Name: Activate Grenade Launcher

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Mining Drone exits combat mode to resume harvesting duties
Root.Name: Deactivate Grenade Launcher

TBl1.Tooltip:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources.

Enables:
- Mining Drone
- CARR
TBl1.Name: Build Headquarters

TBl1.Tooltip:
Resource Production Facility

Built over a Fluorine Deposit to Allow Production of Francine Gas
TBl1.Name: Build Exhumer

TBl1.Tooltip:
Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
TBl1.Name: Build Fusion Generator

TBl1.Tooltip:
Ground Vehicle Production facility.

Enables:
- Z-1
- A-6
- TR-17
- Routhe Tank
TBl1.Name: Build Manufacturing Facility

TBl1.Tooltip:
SatNet Communications

Increases speed of nearby allied units and detects cloaked units.

Detector
TBl1.Name: Build Comm Station

TBl1.Tooltip:
Automated Defensive Structure.

Can attack ground and air units.
TBl1.Name: Build Electrostatic Defense Tower

TBl1.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
TBl1.Name: Cancel

TBl1.Tooltip:
Anti-Armor / Anti-Air Cannon

Can Attack Ground and Air units.
TBl1.Name: Nightjar

TBl1.Tooltip:
Infantry training facility.

Enables:
- Combat Infantry
- Heavy Gunner
- Incinerator
- Mortar Trooper
- Rocket Trooper
TBl1.Name: Build Billet

TBl1.Tooltip:
Research and Development.

Research upgrades for your forces.
TBl1.Name: Build R & D Facility

TBl1.Tooltip:
Manned Defensive structure.

Can attack ground units
TBl1.Name: Solitaire
